#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int n,i,e,x;
unsigned int count=0;
priority_queue<int> max;
priority_queue<int, vector<int>,greater<int> > min;
scanf("%d",&n);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
scanf("%d",&e);
if(e==1)
{
scanf("%d",&x);
count++;
if(count>3 && x>min.top())
min.push(x);
else
max.push(x);
if(count/3 >min.size())
{
min.push(max.top());
max.pop();
}
if(count/3 < min.size())
{
max.push(min.top());
min.pop();
}
}
else
{
if(min.size()>0)
printf("%d\n",min.top());
else
printf("No reviews yet\n");
}
}
return 0;
}
